args: from watchdog.observers import Observer; from watchdog.events import FileSystemEventHandler; import subprocess; class Handler(FileSystemEventHandler): def on_modified(self, event): if event.src_path.endswith(('.php', '.css')): subprocess.run(['python', 'ai_controller.py', '--deploy-file', event.src_path]); observer = Observer(); observer.schedule(Handler(), 'wp-theme-youtuneai', recursive=True); observer.start(); observer.join()
